cosmos.question: I shine bright in the sky during the day. I give you warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
💛 I am yellow and round.

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. I have land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 People live here.
💧 I'm mostly covered in water.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.

cosmos.question: I am in the sky at night, and sometimes I look like a banana! What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 I only come out when it's dark.
🐺 Sometimes werewolves howl at me.
🌕 I have phases.

cosmos.question: I'm a bright ball of fire far, far away. I twinkle at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 Many of me make up constellations
✨ I am very hot and very far away!
💫 I shine brightly in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many, many stars. I am huge! What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am like a giant island of stars.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.
💫 I have lots of stars, dust, and gas.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball that goes around the sun. Earth is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I travel around a star.
🌳 I can have plants and animals.
☄️ Some of me are made of gas, some of rock!

cosmos.question: I'm a special rock that falls from space to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I can create a big crater if I land.
🌌 I travel through space before landing on Earth.
🌑 Sometimes people collect me.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I look like an animal, a person, or a thing.
🔭 People have told stories about me for a long time.
🌟 I am made of stars that seem close together.

cosmos.question: I am very, very hot and have planets going around me. I am the center of our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You can't look directly at me
🔥 Everything in our solar system goes around me.
💛 I am a star, but a very special one for us!

cosmos.question: I am a group of planets, moons, and a star that travel together. We all go around the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 Earth is part of me.
🪐 I have eight planets.
🌞 I have one very big star at my center.

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You see me on the road.
👪 I can take your family to the park.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ Pirates might have one.
🚢 I am bigger than a canoe.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I go above the clouds.
🌎 I can take you to far away places.
✈️ You go to the airport to ride me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦶 You need to push to go.
🚲 You can ride me on a path.
🔔 Some of them have a bell.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up kids.
🏫 I take you to learn.
🟡 I am very long.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and take many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I only travel on special roads made of metal.
🚂 I have many carriages hooked up together.
⏱️ I follow a timetable.

transport.question: I help people when there is a fire and have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 You need me in an emergency.
🚒 I have a long hose to spray water.
👨‍🚒 Brave people drive me.

transport.question: I zoom through space and take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I can travel to other planets.
👩‍🚀 I carry special people to the stars.
🌌 I am very fast.

transport.question: I help sick people and have a siren and flashing lights. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I take people to the hospital.
🤕 I have a bed inside.
🩹 I help people get better.

transport.question: I go under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🫧 Fish live near me.
⚓ I can explore the ocean floor.
🌊 I travel underwater.
